import { useContext } from "react" import formatPrice from "../utils/formatPrice" import { ShoppingCartContext } from "../context/ShoppingCardContext" export default function CoffeeCard({ _id, img_url, brand, price, coffee }) { const { shoppingCart, setShoppingCart } = useContext(ShoppingCartContext) return (<>

{brand}

{formatPrice(price)}€

) }
